lenders.name: Mary Beth
lenders.loan_because: I'm a dedicated organic gardener and thus enjoy helping people produce their own food. Almost all of my loans are in the agriculture sector.

lenders.name: Deb
lenders.loan_because: I can, and therefore I should.
lenders.occupational_info: I love to read, and I enjoy helping people.

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: It makes sense to me to help people who have goals and ambitions to improve their situations but lack the resources to do so.

lenders.name: Lin
lenders.loan_because:
"If you don't like the way the world is, you change it. You have an obligation to change it. You just do it one step at a time."
Marian Wright Edelman
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children how to express themselves in the universal language--music.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I have been lucky in my life.  It feels good to be able to help  people to improve themselves and their communities by their own efforts and hard work.

lenders.name: Michael & Anita
lenders.occupational_info: Michael works for a company that does drilling to test the ground for building and environmental purposes as well as geothermal heating and cooling.  Anita is a chemistry teacher

lenders.name: Vikki
lenders.occupation: Forklift Driver for Anheuser Busch Inc.
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone is entitled to financial success through the dignity of their labors. .
lenders.occupational_info: I feel fortunate to work at Anheuser- Busch. It's a great company and the employee benefits are amazing. At the Brewery, I drive a double/single forklift. I stack pallets of beer and load tractor trailers with beer. . My co-workers  are really nice people.We all work hard and are well paid for our efforts. Everyone helps one another out with our tasks so the work is never terribly difficult.  We all enjoy our breaks and have loads of laughs. This is a picture of me with my little dog, Zoe. She loves running on the beach. Zoe is a superstar, a hunter of rabbits and a world traveler.  She is presently considering throwing her hat in the ring for the next mayoral race in Woodbridge.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: Compassion=Joy
lenders.occupational_info: Writer/director

lenders.name: Byron & Gloria
lenders.loan_because: Responsibility to assist others
lenders.occupational_info: Plan, assemble resources to create something.

lenders.name: chrispy
lenders.loan_because:
It is empowering for both sides, and the return on investment is more than worth it.
I heard Mr. Yunus speak and it was an incredibly eye-opening and positive experience. 
I'm happy to do what I can in my own way.
lenders.occupational_info: I spent a long time selling food, now I want to teach yoga. World Citizen.

lenders.name: James & Family
lenders.loan_because: I feel we are all connected by our humanity and must all do what we can to help each other.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a carpet factory repairing the machinery, my wife works for a family medical clinic, we have a large happy family.

lenders.name: Jerry
lenders.loan_because: I've got enough.
lenders.occupational_info: I fly Boeing-777s all over the World

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: My small donations hopefully will allow these individuals to realize their aspiractions for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: Banking

lenders.name: Grace
lenders.loan_because: We all want a better life.

lenders.name: Rumor
lenders.loan_because: Because I can.  Because we all can.
lenders.occupational_info: I help nonprofits with asset and board development, feasibility studies, capital campaigns, etc.

lenders.name: Doug & Lorrie
lenders.loan_because: We have been blessed by those who God has put in our lives and we just want to give something back.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an electrician at a factory that makes beverage cans. I maintain the electrical part of the equipment which makes the cans. Our Factory makes about 13 million cans a day.

lenders.name: Jesse
lenders.loan_because: it's easy.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at Duke University majoring in Biomedical Engineering.

lenders.name: Gibby + Patti
lenders.loan_because: We want to help...
lenders.occupational_info: Dance/Movement teachers

lenders.name: Marie
lenders.loan_because: I love to help others empower themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Work less but smarter to impact others and teach them to do the same.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: Muhammad Yunus.
lenders.occupational_info: Delivering information about the financial markets so people can make smarter, wiser decisions.

lenders.name: Tsaiwei
lenders.occupational_info: Research in cartilage repair

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: I always argue for micro-credit at Model U.N conferences, so I knew when I found this site that I would finally be able to put this to great use.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Computer stuff.

lenders.name: Jack
lenders.loan_because: it's a way of helping people
lenders.occupational_info: I put together a local newspaper

lenders.name: Melinda
lenders.loan_because:
I come from a long line of people who worked hard to get ahead, just like the folks looking for help on Kiva.
It feels good to help people all over the world. These folks are all motivated to improve the quality of their lives by building up their business. No matter what country, people share the common goal of trying to better  themselves. Using Kiva, I like that my loan has a greater value and impact than the dollar amount I can afford to lend. Thank you Kiva, for the opportunity to contribute.

lenders.name: Clinton
lenders.loan_because: It is more 'skilled' than keeping all this to myself.
lenders.occupational_info: I help maintain the 'thread of proof' that the work my company does is correct, accurate, and complies with the contract.

lenders.name: Wendy
lenders.loan_because: I like to see my money used responsibly.
lenders.occupational_info: A mom taking care of her kids, her family and her community.

lenders.name: Joy G. Lauper
lenders.loan_because: i love people

lenders.name: Jeanette
lenders.loan_because: I like the choice of a specific person to support and encourage.  I feel I can relate to their situation.
lenders.occupational_info: Since I retired from office work I volunteer my time.  For the American Red Cross I help recruit, organize, instruct and assign others who want to volunteer when there is a disaster.  Sometimes it is a house fire, othertimes something that effects many people, like a flood or wildfire, etc.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: I need to repay, and to expand upon, the help I have accepted along the way.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: A loan gives people real incentive to improve their condition. Money can help get over hurdles, but it's the motivation that gets you there.

lenders.name: Martha
lenders.loan_because: I remember when I opened my own business many years ago and I had to have my husand co-sign as I had been a "Stay-at-home" mother and no bank would lend me start-up funds.

lenders.name: Troy
lenders.loan_because: It is a way of helping others who want to help themselves.

lenders.name: Ray & Janel
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people who are trying to make a better life for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Michele
lenders.loan_because: This is a wonderful opportunity where a small amount of money can make a huge difference in a family's life.  You don't get chances like this every day.  It is too good to pass up.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: Many people have no other access to small business loans.  I am pleased to find such a small investment that can make such a large difference to someone else.  It inspires me to see how people work to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach robotics to children ages 9 to 16.  The children learn basic engineering and programming skills, and also teamwork.  I also sell hobby supplies.

lenders.name: Ann, Arnie & Izzy
lenders.loan_because: we want to help people directly to realize their dreams and we want to feel connected to the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Arnie is a sculptor, Ann helps performing artists make new shows and perform around the world and Izzy is a high school student who loves to sing, dance and hang out with her friends.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.occupational_info: I teach business at a local college.

lenders.name: Ernest
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs help to be successful
lenders.occupational_info: I am a media audience research and advertising expert.  I help companies find their customers through the applied use of sophisticated audience measurement services.

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: I've been given so much, in so many forms, and want to help someone else get started on their particular path.
lenders.occupational_info: I facilitate communication between English speakers and Japanese speakers.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I care... and am very blessed and fortunate!
lenders.occupational_info: Selling of medical equipment and supplies

lenders.name: Benjamin (Agaric Design)
lenders.loan_because: People everywhere need resources to do things for others, which is the only reason any of us should 'get paid'.  Unfortunately many very wealthy people accumulate vast resources not doing much or anything for others.  Until this changes so that everyone has a fair share of our world's natural, technological, and human resources, the economy and everything that depends on it is going to be pretty rotten.  Kiva provides a smart way to do something, directly and immediately, about unequal resources stunting human and societal development.
lenders.occupational_info: I make web sites (you are looking at a web site now) with people, other developers and designers, in the Agaric Design Collective.  We like to use the open source free software content management framework Drupal.

lenders.name: Jorg
lenders.loan_because: I'm trying to make up - in a very small way - for the carnage caused around the world by my tax dollars.

lenders.name: Sheila
lenders.loan_because: I think these hard working people are awesome.  I've been so very fortunate during my life, had many advantages, I'd like to pass it on.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm retired now, but when I was working I designed offices for large companies, helped make their workplace attractive, efficient, economical and safe.

lenders.name: Ron McClellan
lenders.loan_because: I feel we can all make a difference.  I feel so fortunate and therefore feel obligated to share this good fortune.  There are so many good people working so hard to help their families.  I hope these loans help them.
lenders.occupational_info: I help create new therapies for diseases utilizing new drugs and now the stem cells from a mother's placenta and umbilical cord blood after a normal healthy birth.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: "...to whom much is given, much is required"
lenders.occupational_info: I am a medical researcher working on discovering neuroactive drugs.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: I's too important and too easy not to.
lenders.occupational_info: I run around New York City helping non-profit organizations with their computers.

lenders.name: Herschel
lenders.loan_because: I have traveled the world and enjoyed many different cultures.  Our bounty in the United States needs to be shared.  This is a way to provide support to those who are less fortunate but determined to improve their situation and that of their country.
lenders.occupational_info: I represent families that have suffered occupational diseases due to work.  I help them make recoveries from people who caused their injury, frequently cancer.

lenders.name: Ian
lenders.loan_because: I understand that I'm better off than I probably want to admit; Kiva allows me to help others to do better while allowing me to remain as well-off as I have been, albeit after a small wait.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a high school student; that is, I am in my eleventh year of schooling.

lenders.name: Bryan
lenders.loan_because: I care
lenders.occupational_info: I help bring high technology products to market

lenders.name: Nate
lenders.occupational_info: I am in college studying to be a doctor.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.occupational_info: I am a college student studying math and economics.

lenders.name: Jacob
lenders.loan_because: I was a Peace Corps volunteer for three years and staff person with Peace Corps for 10 years, micro-lending works!  And with Kiva's 100% repayment rate it was a no brainer.  It is great that you can follow the person's story directly.  What a great idea!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a National Park and provide environmental education programs to school children and young visitors to the park.

lenders.name: Gail
lenders.loan_because: some one helped me.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping families keep their loved ones safe and comfortable while they are dying

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: I want to build wealth for the billions who are underinvested.
lenders.occupational_info: I improve government policies. Individuals and organizations hire my company to help them convince the government to change their laws to make most people better off.

lenders.name: Derrick
lenders.loan_because: A chance to improve someones life alot for so little.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a flight nurse

lenders.name: Sean Howell
lenders.loan_because: Access to capital is sure to be the best way to end poverty through efficient self-direction of a nation's own people.  I look forward to the day when another banker earns the right to win a Nobel Prize.
lenders.occupational_info:
Sean Howell, work on Wall St and an entrepreneur.  After living in Tanzania, I continue to be involved with a number of East African non-profits and support a registered non-governmental organization, the Community Development and Relief Agency (www.CODRA.org). CODRA works on protecting the environment, health, education, micro-credits, and good governance. I have been a fellow of the World Affairs Council (www.world-affairs.org) and currently serve as a trustee of their board. At the Council I am also President of the Young Professionals International Network. I am a graduate of Pacific Lutheran University. My personal interests include socially responsible investments, emerging markets, outdoor recreation, and the arts—I've served as an Arts Commissioner for the city of Seattle. I am the co-founder of Friends of Seattle (www.friendsofseattle.org). When not trying to effect change, I enjoy playing Scrabble at Vivace café on Capitol Hill.

My organization;
http://www.friendsofseattle.org

my personal page 
http://www.friendster.com/seanhowell

my professional page
http://www.linkedin.com/in/seanhowell 

My music/arts project:
http://www.rawspacemusic.com
I am a music enthusiast and arts fan, co-own a rock concert venue called Raw Space 

Check out the Green Kiva Loan page: www.kiva.org/community/viewTeam?team_id=231

lenders.name: Entera
lenders.loan_because: I'm a self employed artist and single mother.  I've also travelled extensively, and witnessed firsthand the unbelievable poverty contrasted with warmth, grace, and industry of the people who live there.  I'm so happy to have this opportunity to contribute!
lenders.occupational_info: I am expert in many areas of visual art (painting in all mediums, sculpture, etc.).  I support myself and daughter (who is in college now!) doing mostly commissioned art, murals and decorative work, cartooning, etc.  I love what I do and thank Life every day for this gift.

lenders.name: Todd
lenders.loan_because: Microcredit is the model for eliminating poverty not via programs from the UN and World Bank which simply create opportunities for corrupt leaders to steal the resources.  Wealth is health!!
lenders.occupational_info: My firm provides public affairs and strategic advice to a range of clients via our network of think tanks, academics, and media relations.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people to be self-sufficient and to help them realize their dream.

lenders.name: JEFFREY
lenders.loan_because: Heart
lenders.occupational_info: Fighting greed

lenders.name: rennie
lenders.loan_because: I believe this is the best way to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Redmar & Marije
lenders.loan_because: Being entrepreneurs ourselves, we know how hard it can be to start or preserve your own business. We are so fortunate to live in a country that gives us much opportunities to do so. By supporting Kiva we hope to give others the opportunity to achieve their goals, support their families and, of course, make their businesses successful!
lenders.occupational_info:
We are both photographers, but with different interests. Redmar is specialized in reportage and portrait photography, Marije is specialized in making photo-based artworks and working with Photoshop.
Because we like to share our knowledge with other people we also teach short photography courses for absolute beginners, enthusiastic amateurs and professionals who like to increase their skills.

lenders.name: JP
lenders.loan_because: I like to encourage people to improve their lives, especially by being an entrepeneur.

lenders.name: annie
lenders.loan_because: You have to give to receive. I have got far more than I deserve so I hope to give back and help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a webmaster who raises two loving sons.

lenders.name: Yolanda
lenders.loan_because: With a little, you can do a lot.

lenders.name: Leonardo, Jr.
lenders.loan_because: I am curious if this can be adopted by a rural bank I am connected with.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired IT person since 2000, with CIO of a universal bank as my exit position.  I have been teaching part time in an MBA program at my college alma mater.  I have also done part time IT consulting and dean.

lenders.name: alan
lenders.loan_because: it makes a difference
lenders.occupational_info: large, live popmusic events, commercials, documentaries, all over the world. Trying not just to work but also to make a difference.

lenders.name: Collin
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a first grader

lenders.name: Alicia
lenders.loan_because: it is an opportunity for me to make a small,small difference in someone's life, someone I dont know, but who has the spirit to survive.

lenders.name: The Flicks Community
lenders.loan_because: all the money was given to the manager of The Flicks as a donation to take over the business from over 150 people all over the world. After 6 months that money would become a donation on Kiva and that's where it is now...
lenders.occupational_info:
Dance like no one is watching
Love like you've never been hurt
Sing like no one is listening
Live like it's heaven on earth

lenders.name: Pietro
lenders.loan_because: I believe in supporting people in their country
lenders.occupational_info: I am responsible for developing new formulations for laundry detergents in a multinational Research center

lenders.name: Hans-Christian
lenders.loan_because: I feel that building up entreponeurship is the only way out of dependency for people in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I founded and grow an IT business as well as several other companies.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: little things still can mean a lot; improve a life, have one outdoor dinner less.

lenders.name: Chaim
lenders.loan_because: I believe that microfinance is very powerful tool in battling poverty.

lenders.name: Max
lenders.loan_because:
I love the idea that a relatively small amount for me can be really helpful for someone trying to make a living for themselves and their family on the other side of the globe. 

Besides, who knows the long term effects - maybe my loan gets some child to higher education and later he or she discovers the cure for cancer which in turn will help someone in my family? 
It's a small planet and we're all living on it.

lenders.name: Irsan
lenders.loan_because: everybody deserves a chance

lenders.name: Jordie
lenders.loan_because:
I think the best way to fight poverty is to stimulate entrepreneurship. 
This way people learn to make a living for themselves.

lenders.name: Eik & Thom
lenders.loan_because: It is an easy way to help people to help themselves.

lenders.name: Hans
lenders.loan_because: I believe in Kiva as a way of giving people all over the world a chance to create a life for themselves and their family to live independent and make their dreams come through.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to be a management consultant until a car accident changed my whole world. Now I am handicapped, but try to make this world a better place for everyone (including myself) by doing the things I enjoy and find important.

lenders.name: Drew
lenders.loan_because: I think microfinance is a great way to make a difference to help entrepreneurs in developing nations without comprimising dignity or respect.

lenders.name: Jolijt
lenders.loan_because:
I can help people who take their lifes into their own hands, and try to escape poverty. Courageous people like that deserve all the support they can get!
And the amazing thing is that you can help several people with the same money, once the loan has been repaid!
lenders.occupational_info: Preparing financial statements for small and medium-sized enterprises.

lenders.name: Lars
lenders.loan_because: I believe the best way of eradicating poverty is by building business.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a private investment company focusing on business development in emerging markets.

lenders.name: Erik
lenders.loan_because: I think micro credit works.

lenders.name: Oisín
lenders.loan_because: I believe if we are in a position to help others, we have an obligation to do so.  I can, so I do.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage IT projects

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: After 25 years as a United Methodist minister, I am now embarked on a sales career and doing well.  I still want to do good, and for me, the concept of microloans points the way forward to making maximum impact in the lives of other people who work as hard as I do but don't have the same opportunities.  My goal is to create a $100,000 revolving loan fund that will continue to help others after I die.  I hope to have many years to reach my goal!

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I am a member of the world community who has been blessed with abundance.
lenders.occupational_info: I support a team of people who manage residential communities.

lenders.name: Claire
lenders.loan_because: I want to help create a better and more equitable world for all, and I am blessed to have the means to make these loans.

lenders.name: Calob
lenders.occupation: Pastor in the United Methodist Church
lenders.loan_because: It's awesome! Everyone should have the tools of economic empowerment.
lenders.occupational_info:
Jesus.
Service.
SpongeBob.
Snowboarding.

lenders.name: Sankar
lenders.loan_because: Feels like at least I am trying to do something worthwhile

lenders.name: Sheryl
lenders.loan_because: We would like to help people directly. This is a fantastic opportunity for my children to learn how to help others and that giving is so important.
lenders.occupational_info: We are teachers.  We teach about better health and living.

lenders.name: eliz.
lenders.loan_because: i've been there

lenders.name: Chuck
lenders.loan_because: Many people in my life have invested in me over the years. Their love and support has made it possible for me to move forward at times when doing so would have otherwise been difficult. I honor these people  by investing in others in the same spirit.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a teacher & a writer of educational materials.

lenders.name: Eckart
lenders.loan_because: It is my vision that we can create a humane future for everyone and an earth that provides all we need
lenders.occupational_info:
My work is in the field of education and art. 
After a life time of experience I now write on leadership development and sustainability.
Co-Organiser of exhibitions contemporary Tibetan Art.

lenders.name: Joanne
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a wonderful idea to help others in lots of countries.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: The combination of small investments and opportunity brings us closer to better lives and purpose.
lenders.occupational_info: My firm collects delinquent accounts for commercial, consumer and medical firms. We're based in Atlanta, GA and serve clients around the US.

lenders.name: clive
lenders.loan_because: This seems like a good way of directly engaging with people in an equal partnership
lenders.occupational_info: Support to charitable organisations with fundraising and research needs

lenders.name: Donald
lenders.loan_because: We are not alone...
lenders.occupational_info: Blue collar union man.Work hard and efficient.

lenders.name: Hubert
lenders.loan_because:
Think Globally. 
Help the world economy within my means. 
One People, One Heart.

lenders.name: Abraham
lenders.loan_because: To give people an opportunity.

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because: it is more than a stop gap approach.

lenders.name: Diane and Helik
lenders.loan_because: We believe that providing help to entrepreneurs is the best way to help good people out of their poverty. They know best what their needs are and what to do with the funds. By helping people in the developing world engage in the developed world economy we hope to bring an end of poverty in our generation.
lenders.occupational_info: Improving business practices by streamlining processes and integrating information systems into  business operations.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I really want to see some success for these entrepreneurs around the world.

lenders.name: Derk
lenders.loan_because: Better to lend people a rod and line, than to give them a fish.
lenders.occupational_info: Student of Political Science, International Relations

lenders.name: Mike & Sebi
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: My international work has allowed me to meet dozens of good people who can sustain their families and contribute to thier local economies if only they could come up with a small amount of money to launch a business. Normally such a business entails application of a skill they already possess. I really do believe that my small loans will help create entreprenuers who can look after their families better than any government.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide consulting services to several developing countries for projects sponsored by international and bilateral donors. My specialties are in public sector reform, decentralization and governance.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I think microfinance is undersupplied and I especially want to help small businesses operated by women.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with local and regional development planning worldwide.

lenders.name: Sheila
lenders.loan_because: I believe the best way to spread peace and freedom is to empower families to have the economic opportunities that allow children to have an education.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach science classes (biology and chemistry) to students who are 14 or 15 years old.

lenders.name: unclekybo
lenders.loan_because: The program seems an effective tool in building peoples confidence and livelihood. I have a little extra and so I would like to support such an endeavor.
lenders.occupational_info: I am transitioning from a "for-profit" career in Information Technology to one of public service.  Preparing to go to law school.  I also am in the National guard.  My hope is to one day be a part shaping International Affairs and world policy.

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.occupational_info: I work on Internet projects that make a difference.

lenders.name: gayle
lenders.loan_because: i want to help empower people to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: my work is to send wonderful people to help aging people remain happy in their own homes and get the help they need in order to remain independent.

lenders.name: ANDREA
lenders.loan_because: I believe in micro-credit economomy

lenders.name: Leo
lenders.loan_because: During my travelling I have encountered sufficient situations of people who have it less lucky than I. A loan leaves people in their dignity but helps them.
lenders.occupational_info: In 2007 I did quit my job and now I explore the world.

lenders.name: Mary Lou
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people succeed
lenders.occupational_info: People call my employer for help when their water heater, well pump, water & drain pipes, or toilets are broken.  I send out plumbers to make repairs.

lenders.name: Aditi
lenders.loan_because: small amounts of money can go a long way in helping the poor help themselves.

lenders.name: Tim & Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: Kiva gives us the opportunity to act globally and personally.

lenders.name: Tayyba
lenders.loan_because: I care for plucky people who try to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I write literature for children. Occasionally I write about life for grown ups too...

lenders.name: Lloyd
lenders.loan_because: I've been looking for a way to give a "helping hand", not a "handout", and Kiva is the first reputable organization I have found that does this by transfering 100% of my money to vetted recipients.

lenders.name: Gabriel
lenders.loan_because: I want to be a blessing to someone here and there
lenders.occupational_info: I work to help educate, feed and nurture children.  I am the president of a non-profit organization and I have devoted my time to change the lives of the children in my programs.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: it's a privilege to help those who are trying so hard.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on new ways to improve telecommunications.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: It's easy. It's fun.  People benefit from it.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage people who work with computers in the US.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of direct support on a small scale
lenders.occupational_info: I have retired after 43 years of work and I am trying to enjoy life and to help others finding their way

lenders.name: Helene
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving people the opportunity to live their dreams and to empower them to achieve success.
lenders.occupational_info: My art photography is my creative outlet and I enjoy capturing a variety of subjects both at home and during my travels.

lenders.name: Nicholas
lenders.loan_because: it beats regular interest rates.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I lived overseas for a time and travelled in 3rd world countries like Nigeria and Thailand and worked with people from Pakistan and Bangaladesh. These people have a wonderful outlook on life and it makes me grateful for all the things that we as americans take for granted. I want to do something to help these wonderful people.
lenders.occupational_info: I create images of spaces for people to live, work, and shop in. Other people take those images and turn them into buildings so there is a cooperative effort, like the cooperation in Kiva.org whereby a group can accomplish more than the individuals alone.

lenders.name: Harold
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people reach their goals and be successful
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the life insurance industry

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: I like helping out those in need and like seeing the direct impact of my donation.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked in commercial real estate lending, not so different from how Kiva operatres.  We lend money to those buying buildings and they repay us within 3 years!

lenders.name: Lee
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone deserve a living wage. If my loans can help do that, so much the better.

lenders.name: maria
lenders.loan_because: It is the best feeling that I have had in a while.
lenders.occupational_info: Doing suooertive work for the elderly population here on the Island

lenders.name: World History 1
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we want everyone to have a chance to expand their business and pursue their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a small class of high school students who are studying world history. Our school is in Maryland.

lenders.name: Peggy
lenders.loan_because: I hope that I can help someone become self sufficent and financially stable.

lenders.name: Rita, Mike & Jan
lenders.loan_because: This is such a great idea.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: I can and it's a good thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I play with computers all day.

lenders.name: Nidhi Chanani
lenders.loan_because: I believe in supporting organizations and people who are working for positive change. Giving a loan is a small way I can help women break the cycle of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist and illustrator.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I am able and the needs is great.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with clients to design and build homes

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: I really believe in the Kiva concept.

lenders.name: Chelsea
lenders.occupational_info: law student

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: I think there is much to do around the world and I want to do some things myself
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a teacher

lenders.name: AnnMarie
lenders.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in my life and I think it is important to share my gifts with others.  Lending is a wonderful opportunity to enable someone else to acheive thier goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a nursing student at Marquette University in Milwaukee, WI

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: It's a very little thing and it may help others to a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to be a computer programmer and computer systems designer. It was so much fun, I should have paid to do it.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I think loans are a more effective way to encourage economic independence.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a graduate student in psychology at Stanford University.

lenders.name: Roger
lenders.loan_because: I have been given every opportunity in the world to succeed and I hope to return the opportunity to others across the globe.

lenders.name: Qaiser
lenders.loan_because: Through micro-credit I am helping those people who want to help themselves. With whatever I have extra I'd like to share it with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a legal publishing firm.

lenders.name: Jose
lenders.loan_because: I was fortunate to be born in this wonderful country and have personaly seen what just a little help can do for an entrepreneur.
lenders.occupational_info: I work very hard  keeping construction sites clean, but plan to open up my own sports memorabilia shop one day.

lenders.name: ELLEN
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves at least one break in life.
lenders.occupational_info: Last year I was recovering from chemotherapy, which put my life on hold for several months.  I am very grateful for my cancer remission. My hope is that someone else will be able to have a better life with my help.

lenders.name: Ross & Ann
lenders.loan_because: We want to help others have a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: WE fish for salmon with gilnets at a remote site on the West side of Kodiak Island in the Gulf of Alaska

lenders.name: Jamie
lenders.loan_because: I think this is an excellent way to help individuals achieve their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: At work I support a network of computers... when I'm not at work I enjoy mountain biking, scuba diving and travelling.

lenders.name: Wallace
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people who are willing to help themselves and usually the best way to do that is directly, not through government programs. Kiva is the Internet at it's best....
lenders.occupational_info: Oil and gas and photography

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I want to help out others who need a small helping hand, and have the drive to make good on their goals and commitments. I like this lending model, and I like the ability to make a more direct impact to a person.

lenders.name: Molly
lenders.loan_because: It's a very small way that I can help make a bigger difference in the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am writing a book about living in Central Russia.

lenders.name: Vicki
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a positive difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I own real estate (like houses and warehouses) and receive rents every month.  This is how I earn my living.

lenders.name: Bärbel
lenders.loan_because: I believe in micro credit
lenders.occupational_info: Internet business

lenders.name: Celina
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can, and because I like the thought of my money going to places I may never see.  I admire the hard work being done by the entrepreneurs Kiva sponsors.  I'm honored to do what I can to support it.

lenders.name: Lawson
lenders.loan_because: All of us who are able, need to help change the world - one person at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with groups of people and individuals who want to think well together about things that really matter.

lenders.name: VERONICA L
lenders.loan_because: I LOVE TO SEE WHAT DIFFERENCE MY LOAN CAN MAKE TO A PERSON WHO WANTS TO WORK AND JUST NEEDS A LITTTLE HELP TO GET STARTED

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because:
as the Tao says:  "Surrender yourself humbly; then you can be trusted to care for all things.
Love the world as your own self; then you can truly care for all things."
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher and a court appointed advocate for kids.

lenders.name: Debbie
lenders.loan_because: its time to give back

lenders.name: Todd
lenders.loan_because: My God and Lord Jesus Christ has blessed me with more than I need.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am also a business owner and sell a number of indoor water fountains for home and corporate office buildings.  

At http://www.watergifts.com we can also custom engrave the fountains with you company logos.

lenders.name: Morton
lenders.loan_because: It is a way to be more socially responsible and to help solve the "big problems" of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a philosophy professor who believes in human rights.

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving a helping hand up...not a hand out. The Kiva model matches my beliefs perfectly.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked for more than 40 years in the insurance industry but am now fully retired.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: giving entrepreneurs access to credit allows them to help themselves.

lenders.name: gene keenan
lenders.occupational_info: i work in advertising and marketing. My focus is on mobile phones and how businesses can use them to connect to people.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: The entrepeneurs on Kiva need the money more than I do.

lenders.name: Fred
lenders.loan_because: To help less fortunate people. I also believe by helping the females you make more chang.

lenders.name: Gordon
lenders.loan_because: I want to help women in Samoa become self-reliant and able to provide for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an official court reporter who takes down everything that is said in court proceedings and prepare transcripts of those proceedings when requested.

lenders.name: Asan   G Tejwani
lenders.loan_because:
Sri Sathysa Sai Baba inspiration for Helping Others ( HELP EVER, HURT NEVER. LOVE ALL, SERVE ALL)
In helping others, I help myself.

I have first hand experience of growing up in Refugee camps after India's partition.

I feel and understand the pain of poverty and excitement and dignity of Financial Freedom.

"How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world"-- Anne Frank
lenders.occupational_info:
Quasi Retired from Financial / Insurance Services.
 Seeker and souljourner.

lenders.name: Tom and Nita
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone on the planet should have the opportunity to borrow money in order to better their lives. I want to connect with people who deserve the opportunity. The bible encourages me and M. Yunus has opened the doors with his book.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been a Volkswagen Mechanic and I am now retired. I want to give back to others. My wife and I are active in our church, local schools, Operation Christmas Child, and especially in missions

lenders.name: The Simmons Family
lenders.loan_because: it's a small way to help us feel connected to the larger world, particularly parts of the world that are different from where we live.

lenders.name: Yola
lenders.loan_because: I get infinite numbers of chances in my life, just because of the sheer luck of being born in the West, and am therefore in the position to help others get more chances.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people enjoy their life in general and their work & relationships more by enhancing their awareness of their motives and help translate these into appropriate action.

lenders.name: RON
lenders.loan_because: Establishing businesses that sustain themselves improves the lives of the business owner and the surrounding community on an ongoing basis.  The payoff is better than a one-time gift.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a printing/mailing/design business.  I am interested in helping businesses in Latin America, Africa, and the Southeast Asia.

lenders.name: Theresa
lenders.loan_because: I believe microfinance is one of the best ways we can enable the poor to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at the University of Michigan who is interested in Anthropology  (the study of culture) and International Studies

lenders.name: Seema & Shantanu
lenders.loan_because: We are from India and have seen first hand the debilitating effect of grinding poverty. We are lucky to have a very good life in the US but would like to help others and make a difference. We like Kiva because it really is the 21st century equivalent of the saying “give a man a fish and you give him a meal. Teach him how to fish and you give him a livelihood.” We would like our loan to create a sustainable means for the recipient to support his/her family. We intend to make most of our loans to women because in poor countries it is very often the women who end up with the burden of supporting the family and they manage to do so against insurmountable social and economic odds. This is our humble attempt at female empowerment and emancipation.
lenders.occupational_info:
We both work in the IT field. 
Seema: Analysis and design of IT systems to increase the effectiveness of the client's IT and business processes.

Shantanu: Sales of software implementation services specializing in Business Intelligence.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because:
I feel there are huge numbers of worthy people in the world who deserve the opportunity to at least have a go at their dream. 

i am happy to have the opportunity  to help, even in a small way.
lenders.occupational_info: artist/business owner

lenders.name: Silva
lenders.loan_because: I believe that empowering individuals is the key to long-term success and because something that is a small sum to me can make a big change elsewhere.
lenders.occupational_info: I write and edit texts for websites and take care of all kinds of technical stuff to make them appear.

lenders.name: Bryan
lenders.occupational_info: I consult with small business owners and sell them our small business inventory software.

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: Small business is the keystone of personal and community stability.

lenders.name: koosje
lenders.loan_because: I think this system of micro-credit is a very good idea and also because I hope to stimulate women especially in Africa to become independent.
lenders.occupational_info: counselling asylum seekers in the Netherlands to get permission to stay here

lenders.name: Hugh
lenders.loan_because: Each dollar I give will have a pay it forward impact
lenders.occupational_info: I manage people.

lenders.name: Dayal
lenders.loan_because: because that is what "the one" up above would want me to do...
lenders.occupational_info: I make computers do most anything I want them to... In the process the "computers" make me do anything they want :-)

lenders.name: Kurt
lenders.loan_because: if we don't who will?
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying to be a physician and am currently doing research into how a mother's environment can affect her unborn child's heart.

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: It is nice to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I am fully self-employed, as both a Realtor (housing sales) and as an investor who buys and fixes up houses.

lenders.name: Janice
lenders.loan_because: I want to be involved in the effort to assist economic and political development in developing and underdeveloped countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a highschool teacher for young teenage mothers.  I also own and operate a ceramic art studio.

lenders.name: The McKennas
lenders.loan_because: we're all on the same road
lenders.occupational_info: Making animated films for the cinema, I try to lead a team to bring out the best they can be.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: This is a great opportunity to help people and it empowers those you help to help others! Pay it forward!
lenders.occupational_info: Boring, full on desk-jockey!

lenders.name: Yasser
lenders.loan_because: Well, I am just a courier service....delivering His money to where He wants...

lenders.name: Kassie
lenders.loan_because: I'm not quite changing the world at my current occupation (but we're close to doing so!) and I really would like to make more of a difference in the lives of impoverished people. After traveling around the world during a college program called Semester at Sea, I really got a first hand look at how people live in 3rd world countries. It's enough to inspire me to do something.
lenders.occupational_info: We run clinical trials to test the medical device that we make at different locations around the country, and I manage the data that comes back.

lenders.name: Brian and Kelly
lenders.loan_because: We are here to help others
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that develops   drug solubility and transport technologies.

lenders.name: Mema
lenders.loan_because: I chose this as I think that it promotes dignity and self respect.  I'm encouraged that people with just a small amount of help can grow a business and add to their community.

lenders.name: Joshua
lenders.occupational_info: support education through the use of data

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I believe microcredit is the most effective way to allow the citizens of the world in less developed regions to develop themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Colin
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: God has given to me so I may give to others

lenders.name: alan & ellen
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to help other people become successful business owners.
lenders.occupational_info: We work with computer software and retirement plans

lenders.name: Michelle Olson
lenders.loan_because: I am inspired by organizations like Kiva.  It brings me pleasure to lend to those who Kiva serves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently at home, raising my two boys.

lenders.name: LLOYD
lenders.loan_because:
when you have a dream it becomes a vision.
that vision becomes hope, and your hope creates goals. then the goals become success
lenders.occupational_info: i do job placements for anyone in the world. i let the your cv / resume do the work for you. it will place you in your country of preference according to your skills. i link with employers and other recruiters via the internet

lenders.name: Sina
lenders.loan_because: Having traveled extensively, I saw first-hand how the money we sometimes take for granted can literally change lives.  And I like Kiva's synthesis of social networking and microfinancing to create a model that makes the lending process simple, efficient and fulfilling for everyone involved.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an online dating site, and I help my company enter into deals with other companies in order to improve our product and profitability, while making sure all agreements are legal and accurate.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: I believe that even small gestures can have a powerful effect on a person's life.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I created and now maintain a website on the Internet, through which we sell products and services to flexographic printers.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I just like to help people; No philosophy, no politics - I just do.

lenders.name: Mike P
lenders.loan_because: Kiva's a great way to move folks from poverty to self sufficiency.

lenders.name: Edward
lenders.loan_because: It seems like a very effective and direct way to make an impact on an individual basis.

lenders.name: Heather and Matt
lenders.loan_because: We believe everyone needs a little help now and then.
lenders.occupational_info:
Matt: I design systems such that they can withstand a variety of stresses they might encounter.

Heather: She works on the Base of the Pyramid initiative, which researches how to make the poorest of the poor producers and consumers in order to alleviate poverty in a sustainable way.

lenders.name: Curt
lenders.loan_because: By American standards my income is below average.  But, by world standards, I am a very wealthy man.  It only seems right that I share with people who are willing to try to actualize their dreams.

lenders.name: El Peso Nuestro
lenders.loan_because:
I want to make the difference on the life of small entrepreneurs.

Quiero hacer una diferencia en la vida de los pequenos empresarios.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an engineer working to get a degree in psychology.

lenders.name: Leah
lenders.loan_because: The women of the Middle East are strong and capable. They have many challenges and need the opportunity to succeed. I would like to be a part of their success.
lenders.occupational_info: After my children were raised and I was a grandmother, I taught English in Siberia in a city called Kemerova. I now travel in the U.S with my husband to visit our grandchildren.

lenders.name: Jayne
lenders.loan_because: I am a small business owner and I had to use all my savings to get into business.  If I didn't have my savings it would have been very hard to start up, nobody out there gives you a chance, so I wanted to help out another entrepreneur.
lenders.occupational_info: Mobile Groomer.  I have a van with a table and a bathtub and I go to peoples homes and wash and clip their dogs hair.

lenders.name: Meagan
lenders.loan_because: I was inspired by Nick Kristof's Op-Ed in the NYT on March 27, 2007.

lenders.name: Shelah
lenders.loan_because: it makes me happy to be able to help someone who needs it.

lenders.name: Gwynne
lenders.loan_because: I have so much and this is a wonderful way to share  directly with people who are working to improve their lives.

lenders.name: The Krazi Family
lenders.loan_because: It is one small way to enable others to help themselves.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: I can - even as a graduate student, I can use some "spare" cash to make a bigger difference in the world than just a little interest in my bank account. Also, having lived and traveled extensively in developing countries, I appreciate the vast difference between my life in the US and that of many people in other countries. Hopefully these loans can help bridge this gap.
lenders.occupational_info: As a PhD student, I teach and study about China, religion, and nonprofit organizations. My work often takes me to China.

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help other people around the world improve their, and their families, lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a scientist.  I do medical research in a laboratory.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I want to use my good fortune to help others
lenders.occupational_info: I help people invest their money for the future

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.loan_because: In the developing world, a little bit really can go a long way.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I want to give entrepreneurs in developing countries a chance to improve their quality of life!
lenders.occupational_info: I go to business school at Santa Clara University in California. When I graduate I will go into public accounting.

lenders.name: Palmer
lenders.loan_because: Poverty affects everyone, even the well off, in countless ways. Helping someone out of poverty necessarily helps us all.

lenders.name: Arthur
lenders.loan_because: My wife and I want to have a positive impact on people around the world.  Our faith in Jesus Christ compels us to care about and serve others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with a group of wonderful people (some from India) that design computer systems for a bank in the US.

lenders.name: Teri Forsythe
lenders.loan_because: Microlending is a fantastic way to build capacity and independence around the globe.

lenders.name: Sylvie & Jean
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel good. I saved this money to get a Gamecube but I wanted to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am 9 years old and I'm in fourth grade.

lenders.name: Peggy
lenders.loan_because: I spent a couple weeks in Mauritania, West Africa with my daughter, who is serving there in the Peace Corp. I was so impressed with the warmth and generosity of the people and want to do something to help this part of the world. Kiva and the Heifer Project are 2 organizations that I believe can really provide a catalyst for change.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office and take care of all the paperwork that comes in, keeping track of expenses and income for our business.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: I want to be a part of helping build healthy people, families, & communities all over the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a pastor at a Christian church.  I teach at the church and spend most of my time working with young adults and chasing my three children.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Doing good feels good

lenders.name: David Pogorelc
lenders.loan_because: I hope someone would do it for me under different circumstances.
lenders.occupational_info: Before founding Core Investments, David was a founder and partner at Helm Investments, a real estate investment firm focusing on residential Boston properties. Prior to co-founding Helm, he was investing in undervalued real estate and enhancing and creating value through a variety of development projects. Over the past two decades, David Pogorelc has developed a significant contact base in the Boston market that has contributed to the success of Core and its partnerships.

lenders.name: Teresa
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the desire of people to work and make a better life for themselves an their children.
lenders.occupational_info: International Legal Development -- promoting the Rule of Law and Human Rights

lenders.name: Eugenie
lenders.loan_because: I loan because as a reitred Philosophy Prof and the mother of an adult daughter with autism I cannot do a lot in a financial way for those who need help.  Kiva seems a wonderful way to make a small contirbution continue to help those struggling to make a good life,a contribution that goes on.  Thank you for this opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I taught philosophy ethics, philosophy of biology, philosophy and ecology for 30 years.  Now in retirement my husband, Roger and I have founded a non-profit called Autism Community Initiative with 80 other families with adults with autism who have no future except what we provide.  We plan to build a real community designed specifically to meet the environmental and social needs of adults living with autism.  It is to be environmentally green and therapeutically enriching for our children.  Wish us luck and blessings we need it.

lenders.name: Pat
lenders.loan_because: Microloans are a powerful way to help entrepreneurs build their businesses and become financially independent.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop programs and systems to help improve the health of populations with chronic illnesses

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because: Helping people to become successful capitalist is a great way to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work very hard every day 10 to 12 hours and am always at risk for a loss but I benefit from my work and it is rewarding when I am successful.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs a helping hand some time.

lenders.name: Rich
lenders.loan_because: Economic self reliance, in cooperation with others, breaks the barriors of race and religion, and alleviates the root of much of the world's problems, the dispair and hopelessness of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I draw cartoons that make people laugh and help them understand new subjects.

lenders.name: Brett
lenders.loan_because: micro-finance is one of the most effective means of raising living standards, particularly access to the basics such as education, medical care, potable water.
lenders.occupational_info: Water treatment engineer

lenders.name: Tricia
lenders.loan_because: It is wonderful to be able to make a direct investment in someone who will use my small loan to create a sustainable improvement in the their life and the lives of their children.
lenders.occupational_info: I study, write, and teach about international relations - in particular the utility and limitations of military force as a policy instrument.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: I believe that one person can make a difference in the world, one small step at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with adults with severe mental illness, like schizophrenia and bipolar disorder.  I am also going to graduate school to earn my master's degree in social work (MSW).

lenders.name: David Barnett
lenders.loan_because: In a world with plenty of money, capital should not be a limiting factor of business growth.  Kiva is fantastic as it is the first organization that I have seen that efficiently connects people with money to people with needs in areas of the world where banks don't operate very well.
lenders.occupational_info: I put together financing to buy and build businesses - money comes from people, banks, and other groups that want to invest.

lenders.name: M`Lynn
lenders.loan_because: What we do for ourselves dies with us. What we do for others and the world remains and is immortal.  Our efforts do make a difference, even when they are minuscule in comparison to the magnitude of the problem.
lenders.occupational_info: I am devoted to social justice, human rights, environmental advocacy, and developing sustainable resources -- for women.

lenders.name: Toni
lenders.loan_because: we're all in this together.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people make peace with past wounds so they may live more fully and connectedly in the prestent.

lenders.name: Meredith
lenders.loan_because: It's a terrific I-can-really-do-something-to-help-the-world concept.

lenders.name: Christian
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm living in Peru now, teaching English.

lenders.name: Jerry
lenders.loan_because: I have been so fortunate in my life. From what I have read, micro lending is one of the most effective ways to assist people in the developing world or people who have not had the opportunities that I have had in my life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a major bank in the United States. I provide working capital loans to middle sized companies that are primarily based in the Southwestern U.S.

lenders.name: Helen
lenders.loan_because: I am able to do so and because it is a good way to help others.

lenders.name: Alysson
lenders.loan_because: I have been very blessed in my life with good health, family and opportunity.  I would like to give back and want to be part of the proof that each one of us CAN make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a background in art and history, working in art galleries, museums and archives.  I have also worked in Italy for several years coordinating cultural tours.

lenders.name: Cody & Alicia
lenders.loan_because: We love to help those who help themselves.

lenders.name: Granny
lenders.loan_because: we are all One.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who know what they want and need to do to improve their lives, but lack the start-up capital. Micro-finance is one of the most effective ways we can help.
lenders.occupational_info: I have an ordinary M-F job but the work I love most is the volunteer work I do weekends at a local museum as a docent, teaching people about other cultures and world history.

lenders.name: REK
lenders.loan_because: I love peace and I hate this war.

lenders.name: Jane and John
lenders.loan_because: We want to help reduce poverty and this is a way to do it directly, on a very personal scale.

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: I think that investing in a person's talents and showing confidence in their ability to succeed is the best way to help them.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a college student in the United States. I go to Miami University in Oxford, OH. I am studying economics and philosophy.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: I saw what one dollar could do for a person when I traveled through Cambodia and Vietnam.

lenders.name: Nitai Deitel
lenders.loan_because: Every little bit can make a difference

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: I've seen how much this can accomplish!
lenders.occupational_info: I study film production and literary arts. Two summers ago I made a documentary about Kiva in Kenya.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: I worked for the Cambodia Microfinance Association in Phnom Penh and saw how succesful microfinance is, and how it changes lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired after a career in finance. I am a volunteer advisor in developing countries, with a particular interest in helping the financial sector better serve the poor.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: I know what it's like to need a loan, to start a business, to raise one's family. My parents, as immigrants to the United States, needed such loans. Their first loans came from their friends through a mutual credit rotating system that is a common form of personal lending in Korea.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the person who maintains the welfare of the employees who work for my company and makes sure that our employees understand their role in our company's business aspirations.

lenders.name: chuck
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves the chance to better their lives and the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I repair machines in a large factory.

lenders.name: Todd
lenders.loan_because: The best form of charity possible is that which allows someone to help themselves.

lenders.name: Jason Buberel
lenders.loan_because: I want to improve the lives of women in developing countries.
lenders.occupational_info: Co-founder of a small real estate technology services company.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I help city leaders plan how they'll spend money to provide services for their community.

lenders.name: Tante Fran and Holly
lenders.loan_because: I want to help an individual directly and this is a credible organization.  I want my niece to be involved in helping people and to know how important it is to share our good fortune with others.

lenders.name: Charla
lenders.loan_because: I want to help women become self sufficient and able to provide for their families

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: It's good Karma.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an engineering student.

lenders.name: Angie & Bruno
lenders.loan_because: it feels so good!
lenders.occupational_info: Bruno repairs & maintains medical equipment & Angie's the assistant to the best rep in Chicago

lenders.name: Jorge A.
lenders.loan_because: I read Banker of the Poor and got convinced that microloans can really help people get over poverty. A couple of months later I ran to a Kiva ad in youtube and found there an excellent opportunity to help.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: Helping others truly makes me happy.  Making a positive difference in the lives of others is one of the best things anyone can do.  Kiva is one of many avenues for doing just that.

lenders.name: Wingsun
lenders.loan_because: Loan instead of a new pair of nike
lenders.occupational_info: IT PM for a corporate america company

lenders.name: Yusuke&Akiko
lenders.loan_because: what these people need is an opportunity, not charity.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a microfinance research institution. This photograph is one of my favorite couples from the field I work in.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: it makes a tangible difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I cook, clean, shop and take care of the children while my wife changes the world in other more tangible ways.

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: So much of the potential of modern communication technology is squandered. I think Kiva is an important opportunity to do something meaningful, no matter how small, through the connectivity of the internet.

lenders.name: Blondie
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed to have enough, plus a little extra. I am glad I can give a little to help someone else.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I lend in the hope of creating a better world.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for all I have and want to help make a difference in someone else's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a Retirement facility for low income seniors.

lenders.name: Annie
lenders.loan_because: i have far too much already. We must take care of each other.
lenders.occupational_info: i travel around the united states to make music because i believe that there is hope in music.

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance is a good way to do development aid!

lenders.name: Alessandro
lenders.loan_because: The good progects sould be always supported
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a gastroenterology departement in an accademic hospital

lenders.name: Demi
lenders.loan_because: It's a miracle!!!

lenders.name: david
lenders.occupation: translator, reviser & former museum library peon
lenders.loan_because: I'm just glad I'm able to.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to be a museum guard and then modern-day clerk, but at a nice museum! Nowadays I'm a translator and an on-call translation & correction coordinator as well as reviser at the local university (www.rug.nl) and still working for an arthouse collective, Vera Zienema. (www.vera-groningen.nl).

lenders.name: Alena
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people who don't have good opportunities like we do.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school.

lenders.name: Pim
lenders.loan_because: I think it is the best way to help. Lender and loaner are on an equal base.
lenders.occupational_info: I am editor of the instructions that are needed by the people who execute the social securities in my country

lenders.name: Ruth/Abby
lenders.loan_because: It's an excellent way to help others achieve their livelihood/happiness/dreams, and to remind me of the kindness my sister had throughout her life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am trying to make sure that I and the institution I work for positively impact the environment, and that we leave places & people better off than when we first encountered them.

lenders.name: Alexander
lenders.loan_because: I want to support people who have the will to change their life for the better.

lenders.name: antonella
lenders.loan_because:
feeling useful for someone helps giving a sense to life.
And also it is great to have a contact with people all over the world

lenders.name: Simon
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference to someone directly.

Charity is injurious unless it helps the recipient to become independent of it.
John D. Rockefeller
lenders.occupational_info: CEO of translation and localization agency

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: I want to contribute to a better world for those who need it, want it, and are willing to show initiative, entrepreneurial spirit and drive, and could use a bit of financial support to make it all happen...

lenders.name: Henk
lenders.loan_because: I believe that many small efforts can make a huge difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I see to it that computersystems are built to make our work easier.

lenders.name: Ron
lenders.loan_because: It is simply a gesture that can make the difference...
lenders.occupational_info: Managing a financial department

lenders.name: Rebecca Chang
lenders.loan_because: Unconditional giving brings blessings in the world
lenders.occupational_info: A happy mind attracts good fortune.

lenders.name: serge
lenders.loan_because: because i am amazed that such small loans can make such a difference

lenders.name: sreenivas
lenders.loan_because: FOR MY EXPANSION OF MY BUSNIESS AND FOR NEW WORKS

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: Every little bit we do is significant.

lenders.name: dilip
lenders.loan_because: service of mankind is the best of god

lenders.name: Hans
lenders.loan_because: Every idea that people have to better their lives and/or community needs a chance.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: As an economist I know the power and the effectiveness of micro-financing and appreciate this opportunity to be a small part of this exciting program.
lenders.occupational_info: My research focuses on poverty issues in the US, particularly the connection between education and poverty.  I direct a program that works with the local school system to provide low income students the opportunity to do service-learning to address poverty issues in the community. We also work on the issue of student drop-outs.

lenders.name: Margareta
lenders.loan_because: I would like to contribute to the microfinancing success stories begun by Mr. Yunus and help women manage their lives and the lives of their children.
lenders.occupational_info: I am interested in languages and the culture of other peoples.

lenders.name: Kelley
lenders.loan_because: I can't afford much, but I want to do what I can to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I fix computers when they break and teach my customers how to take care of their machines in the future.

lenders.name: Noreen
lenders.occupation: Office manager for non profit arts organization
lenders.loan_because: We are all in this together.

lenders.name: AMINGO
lenders.loan_because: I belive everyone
lenders.occupational_info: hope everyone happy  in everything

lenders.name: Nicodeme
lenders.loan_because: it is rewarding to see so little help can make such a difference in the life of so many.
lenders.occupational_info: as a work of a good Samaritan

lenders.name: mario
lenders.loan_because: help people

lenders.name: Jayne
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves. I am particularly interested in helping women business owners and women farmers.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for agencies that work to help people. I help these agencies with communications activities and community involvement. I also try to help local women that I work with, especially women, to build their capacities as communicators and managers.

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.loan_because: it is a sustainable alternative to foreign aid.  Microfinance really makes a difference in people's life and that's what's important!

lenders.name: Miriam
lenders.loan_because: these funds are going straight to the grassroots and not into corporate administrational costs (gone crazy) that are so detrimental to business survival. Its time for all of us to give a little. Everyone has a god given gift if given the chance.
lenders.occupational_info: A business mentor

lenders.name: AmericanAbroad
lenders.loan_because: The Internet should also make a difference for those who cannot afford computers. All of us on this planet are connected.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I support micro credits!
lenders.occupational_info: Educative as a volunteer

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: each little bit helps.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: It shows the true love many Americans have for people in others countries.  I enjoy helping  other people help themselves.  I have been truly blessed by this experience.

lenders.name: Kennesaw Sociology
lenders.loan_because: a small loan will go a long way in creating a better world.
lenders.occupational_info: As a teacher, I try to show students the importance of the sociological imagination in understanding their relationship to the social, cultural, political, spiritual aspects of the global village. Students relate the sociological approach to their lifelong learning.

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: I can take and make business opportunities work. And I want everyone else to have this too!!!

lenders.name: BaseballsPast.com
lenders.loan_because: we believe that fostering entrepreneurship is one of the most effective ways to reduce poverty and all the ills that receive support from proverty. We loan because it works!

lenders.name: Jay
lenders.loan_because: the return on this investment is priceless... a brillant concept and super fun.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies develop and implement corporate real estate strategies.
